data.text: AZKOUL Edmund John Azkoul age 91 of Grand Rapids passed away October 11 2011. In the 40s and 50s Edmund was known throughout West Michigan as Eddie Koul. Orchesta and band conducter musician arranger and composer. He was heard over the airwaves as a radio personality and announcer at WLAV radio station.Eddie was a lifelong salesman and merchandiser for Herpolshiemers Wurzburgs RCA and the owner and operator with his wife of the SherryMark clothing stores. But his greatest passion was his devotion to his wife children and grandchildren. He was preceded in death by his sister Eleanor Joseph. He is survived by his wife of 59 years Barbara; children Sherry (Craig) Morrissey-Forsythe Mark (Anne) Azkoul; brothers William (Bernice) Azkoul Robert (Bonnie) Azkoul; grandchildren Ryan and Marc Morrissey Leigh Azkoul. A celebration of Eds life will be held Saturday 10:00 AM at the OBrien-Eggebeen-Gerst Chapel 3980 Cascade Rd. SE with Eds family officiating. Interment Woodlawn Cemetery. Visitation 6-8 PM and 6-8 PM. Memorial contributions may be made to the American Diabetes Association P.O. Box 888877 Grand Rapids Michigan 49588-8877.
